data.title: thinkdm2 Digital Marketing Agency
data.meta_description: Thinkdm2 created a new brand position for the company, revamped their brand identity, and developed a go-to-market strategy.
data.text:
Challenge: Reinvent a well-established technology company.

Dialogic, known for owning the telephony/communications space since the mid 1980âs, has spent the last decade focusing on developing app solutions for service providers. While the company has evolved in their offerings, the industry still perceives Dialogic as a provider of these legacy solutions. To help Dialogic re-invent themselves, we studied the current landscape for service providers; their primary needs are to get to market fast and cost-effectively. With this insight, we created a new brand position for the company, revamped their brand identity, and developed a go-to-market strategy.
